title: 5 Tips to Keep Your Furniture Looking New
summary: Keep your TrendHome furniture spotless with these simple tips from our experts.
content:
1. Clean with a damp cloth and avoid abrasive products.
2. Do not expose your furniture directly to sunlight to prevent fading.
3. Check and tighten screws regularly.
4. Use floor protectors if you have delicate floors.
5. If you have any questions, contact us on WhatsApp and we'll help you out.

title: Assemble Your TrendHome Furniture in 5 Steps
summary: See how easy it is to assemble our products. All you need are the pieces included in the box and the desire to transform your space.

1. Identify all the pieces and screws.
